event.title: October 23, 1864, a wagon train of refugees had come

data.event: On October 23, 1864, a wagon train of refugees had come from Fort Smith, Arkansas, and was escorted by troops from the 6th Kansas Cavalry under the command of Col. William Campbell.

event.title: was placed near the Crawford County Historical Museum on October 30, 2011

data.event: A granite marker memorial for the "Cow Creek Skirmish" was placed near the Crawford County Historical Museum on October 30, 2011.
